Introduction to Hospitality and Tourism

Throughout the module, students will gain a foundational understanding of the tourism and hospitality industry, starting with an overview and historical development. They'll explore the different sectors, learn customer service fundamentals, and examine the various impacts of tourism. The role of technology and marketing in the industry will be highlighted, along with ethical practices and sustainability. Strategic management and entrepreneurship within tourism and hospitality will be introduced, leading to a focus on professional development in the sector.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify and understand the various components, attributes, and interconnections within the tourism and hospitality industries.

+  Explain the historical development and evolution of the hospitality and tourism industries, including major milestones and influences.

+  Identify and describe current trends and issues affecting the hospitality and tourism industries, including technological advancements, customer preferences, and global challenges.
